SMW Subobject for ClayHigh Alchemy value: 0Examine: Add boiling water to make a tea.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Teapot with leavesUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Teapot with leaves (clay).pngWeight: 1.500Value: 1Version anchor: ClayRelease date: 31 May 2006Item ID: 7700

A teapot with leaves is an item used to make tea in the kitchen of a player-owned house allowing the player to temporarily boost Construction by up to 3 levels. A player can obtain this item by using a teapot with tea leaves. Requiring a Cooking level of 20, players can use this item on a hot kettle, producing a pot of tea and gaining 52 experience. The contents can then be poured into up to 4 empty clay, porcelain, or trimmed porcelain cups.

Regardless of the teapot used in the tea-making process, the boost only depends on the style of cup used.

Note: Leaving the player-owned house will cause all tea-related items to disappear from the inventory.

Teapot Shelf (Construction level)
Clay Wooden shelves 1 (6), Wooden shelves 2 (12), Oak shelves 1 (34)
Porcelain Wooden shelves 3 (23), Oak shelves 2 (45), Teak shelves 1 (56)
Trimmed porcelain Teak shelves 2 (67)

A '''teapot with leaves''' is an item used to [[Cup of tea (Player-owned house)#Making a cup of tea|make tea]] in the [[kitchen]] of a [[player-owned house]] allowing the player to temporarily boost [[Construction]] by up to 3 levels. A player can obtain this item by using a [[teapot]] with [[tea leaves]]. Requiring a [[Cooking]] level of 20, players can use this item on a [[hot kettle]], producing a [[pot of tea]] and gaining 52 experience. The contents can then be poured into up to 4 empty [[Empty cup (clay)|clay]], [[Porcelain cup (porcelain)|porcelain]], or [[Porcelain cup (trimmed)|trimmed porcelain cup]]s.

Regardless of the teapot used in the tea-making process, the boost only depends on the style of cup used.

'''Note:''' Leaving the player-owned house will cause all tea-related items to disappear from the inventory.
